testimonials.title: What Pet Parents Say
testimonials.description: Trusted by hundreds of pet owners in Copenhagen

review1.text: Took my 9-month old puppy, Nora, to her first grooming session. Although she was a bit anxious to start with, the staff at MyPeterinarian quickly tried to bring her some comfort (in the form of treats). They took care of all the grooming (nails, bath, trim, etc.) having Nora all ready for spring. A couple days have passed and she still smells amazing, and more importantly seems to have had a good experience with grooming.
review1.author: Alejandra Jim√©nez

review2.text: The best veterinarian and pet clinic in Copenhagen, with the best location. They have a great vet, groomers, pet sitters and the receptionist is always very friendly. Highly recommended!
review2.author: Jonathan G

review3.text: We left our 17 month old Labrador Pepper with them while we were visiting Copenhagen. While we were at Tivoli Pepper not just only had a great day with his sitter, but also got a dog bath. They sent us plenty of photos and updates during the day and Pepper was really happy when we picked him up. They even asked if we wanted to get a veterinary check because they noticed he had an ear infection. This place cares a lot about dogs and the experience made our visit to Copenhagen much easier. If we ever go back I'll absolutely use their services again. Highly recommended.
review3.author: Ceren Robinson

review4.text: With My Peterinarian your dog is in best hands. Passion, reliability and competence. Easy communication and reports on how the sitting, walking or boarding went. Very highly recommendable!
review4.author: Martine De Vriese

review5.text: My Peterinarian has been amazing with my dogs. They have a lovely veterinarian team and have always been very helpful in whatever I needed. Highly recommend them.
review5.author: Yaitza Alba

pricing.description: All our services have clear pricing. From basic consultations to specialized care, we provide upfront costs with no hidden fees. Contact us for specific quotes.

q1.question: What consultation options do you offer?
q1.answer: We offer flexible consultation options to suit your needs: home visits, consultations at Clinic in Copenhagen, walk-in appointments, and virtual consultations. All our Veterinarians are licensed in Denmark.

q2.question: Do you offer preventive care packages?
q2.answer: Yes! We offer kitten and puppy packages, whole litter vaccinations, anti-parasite treatments, and comprehensive health check packages. These packages provide excellent value for your pet's preventive care needs.

q3.question: How do I book an appointment?
q3.answer: You can book online, call us at +45 61 66 76 11, or email hej@mypeterinarian.com. We serve all areas of Copenhagen and offer both home visits and clinic appointments.

features.title: What Our Dog and Cat Groomer Offers

full.title: Full Grooming Service
full.description: Complete grooming including bath, blow dry, breed-specific cut or trim, nail clipping, ear cleaning, and anal gland check. Dog grooming: 750-1950 DKK, Cat grooming: 1500-1700 DKK (based on size).

bath.title: Bath & Blow Dry
bath.description: Premium bathing service with professional shampoos, thorough blow drying, and basic brushing. Dogs: 700-1100 DKK, Cats: 750-800 DKK.

haircut.title: Breed-Specific Styling
haircut.description: Professional haircuts and styling tailored to your pet's breed standards, including specialized techniques like hand-stripping for terriers.

nails.title: Nail Clipping & Paw Care
nails.description: Safe nail trimming and paw care services. Nail clipping: 150 DKK, Pawdicure: 200 DKK. Available standalone or included in full grooming.

spa.title: Specialized Treatments
spa.description: De-shedding treatments, full spa packages, and specialized care. Dogs: 750-2400 DKK, Cats: 1000-1200 DKK based on size and coat type.

teeth.title: Teeth Brushing & Extra Care
teeth.description: Gentle teeth brushing (200 DKK) and additional services including grooming training (550 DKK) and cat brushing (1300 DKK).

q1.question: What sizes do you accommodate?
q1.answer: We groom all sizes from XS (under 3kg) to XL (over 31kg). Pricing varies by size and coat length. We serve all areas of Copenhagen including Indre By, Vesterbro, √òsterbro, N√∏rrebro, and Amager.

q3.question: What special packages do you offer?

petSitting.title: Pet Care Services
petSitting.subtitle: Professional pet care with a lot of love and attention
petSitting.description: Do you need help with pet care? Our veterinary-educated team provides excellent professional services with personalized attention for your pet. From daily visits to overnight stays, we ensure your pet receives the best care while you're away.

daily.title: Pet Sitting
daily.description: Once daily: 471 DKK. Twice daily: 737 DKK. 60-minute visits include feeding, water change, litter cleaning, short walk, and playtime.

overnight.title: Overnight Stay
overnight.description: 1361 DKK per night. Complete evening and morning routines, feeding, walks, and companionship in the comfort of your pet's own home.

boarding.title: Pet Boarding
boarding.description: At Employee's Home: 1000 DKK/night. At PQ: 1150 DKK/night. Personalized TLC, two long walks, company of one or two other dogs.

walking.title: Dog Walking
walking.description: 30 min: 340 DKK. 1 hour: 465 DKK. 90 min: 645 DKK. Twice daily options available. Includes pick-up, drop-off, playtime, and poop pickup.

medication.title: Medication Administration
medication.description: Professional medication administration (45 DKK/day) for pets with special health needs. Our veterinary-educated team ensures proper care.

updates.title: Pet Daycare
updates.description: Hourly rates from 1-8 hours. 8 Hours: 680 DKK. At Home/Hotel: 4 Hours: 556 DKK, 6 Hours: 790 DKK. Socialization, playtime, and supervised throughout the day.

banner.title: Professional Pet Care in Copenhagen
banner.description: Our veterinary-educated team provides personalized attention for your pet while you're away.
banner.additionalInfo: From daily visits to overnight stays, we ensure your pet receives the best care.

pricing.title: Transparent Pricing
pricing.description: Clear pricing for all services. Introductory meeting: 405 DKK, Pet pick-up/drop-off: 270 DKK. Multi-day packages available with discounts. Contact us for a personalized care plan.

q1.question: What's included in pet sitting visits?
q1.answer: Our 60-minute visits include feeding, fresh water, litter box cleaning, short walks, and quality playtime. Choose once daily (471 DKK) or twice daily (737 DKK, save 165 DKK on 2nd visit) based on your pet's needs.

q2.question: Can you care for multiple pets?
q2.answer: Yes! Our overnight stay service is 1360 DKK per night. We're experienced with multi-pet households and provide individualized attention for each pet.

q3.question: Where is the dog daycare located?
q3.answer: Our dog daycare is located at Peder Hvitfeldts Str√¶de 16, 1173 K√∏benhavn. Full day care (8 hours) is 680 DKK and includes supervised play, socialization, and rest periods.

petPassport.title: EU Pet Passport: Travel With Your Furry Friend
petPassport.subtitle: Official EU pet passport for dogs, cats, and ferrets
petPassport.description: The EU Pet Passport is required for non-commercial travel within the EU and certain other countries. It serves as official identification and proof of rabies vaccination. Only authorized veterinarians can issue passports. Complete service: 1474 DKK.

consultation.title: Professional Consultation
consultation.description: Expert guidance on EU pet passport requirements, travel regulations, and destination-specific rules for smooth international travel.

health.title: Health Verification
health.description: Complete health check and verification that your pet meets all requirements for EU travel. Your pet must be present for ID verification.

vaccinations.title: Rabies Vaccination
vaccinations.description: Required rabies vaccination administered at least 21 days before travel. Prevents spread of serious viral disease. Vaccination details recorded in passport.

microchip.title: Microchip Identification
microchip.description: Mandatory microchipping for dogs in Denmark. Must be done before or simultaneously with rabies vaccination. Provides unique identification number.

documentation.title: Official Documentation
documentation.description: Complete handling of all technical details and official documentation. Owner signs the document, and authorized veterinarian processes everything.

eu.title: EU Pet Passport
eu.description: Official EU pet passport valid for travel within EU member states. Passport remains valid as long as rabies vaccination is current.

step1.title: Book Appointment
step1.description: Schedule your pet passport appointment online or by phone. Home visit options available for your convenience.

step2.title: Microchipping
step2.description: If not already microchipped, we implant an ISO-compliant microchip for unique identification. Mandatory for dogs in Denmark.

step3.title: Rabies Vaccination
step3.description: Administer rabies vaccination (must be at least 21 days before travel). Vaccination details are recorded in the passport.

step4.title: Passport Issuance
step4.description: Authorized veterinarian issues official EU pet passport. Valid while rabies vaccination is current. No new passport needed unless damaged or full.

banner.title: Ready to Travel with Your Pet?
banner.pricing: Complete passport service: 1474 {currency} includes EU pet passport and rabies vaccination.
banner.note: Remember: Rabies vaccination must be at least 21 days before travel.

pricing.title: Complete Passport Service
pricing.description: 1474 DKK includes EU pet passport and rabies vaccination. Home visit option available. Older format passports (pre-2014) remain valid if rabies vaccination is current.

q1.question: How long before travel should I get the passport?
q1.answer: The rabies vaccination must be administered at least 21 days before travel. We recommend scheduling your appointment well in advance to ensure all requirements are met on time.

q2.question: Which animals need an EU pet passport?
q2.answer: EU pet passports apply to dogs, cats, and ferrets for non-commercial travel within EU and certain other countries. The passport serves as official identification and proof of rabies vaccination.

q3.question: How long is the passport valid?
q3.answer: The passport remains valid as long as your pet's rabies vaccination is current. You don't need a new passport unless it's damaged or full. Older format passports (pre-2014) are still valid.

team.title: Meet Our Team
team.subtitle: Passionate professionals committed to your pet's health and happiness

tarek.bio: Born and raised in Jordan, Tarek comes from a multicultural family. He currently lives in Copenhagen after having lived in a number of major cities around the world. Having studied veterinary medicine, Tarek founded MyPeterinarian in 2016 with a mission to create a safe place where you can take your pets and their parents. His love for animals, big or small, is endless.

irene.bio: Irene holds a strong passion for internal medicine, with a primary focus on gastrointestinal disorders, kidney and urinary tract disorders. Her professional journey has spanned across Spain, her country of origin, and the United Kingdom before calling Denmark home. With over 5 years of experience in international vet centers, her unwavering commitment to excellence is evident through her consistent pursuit of advanced learning opportunities and continues skills enhancement throughout her career.

dora.bio: Dora, known to everyone as Dori, is from Hungary and has been living in Denmark for nearly five years. Having lived in Aarhus and Odense, she now resides in Copenhagen's city center with her boyfriend. When she's not busy at MyPeterinarian, you can find her playing board games. She has two cats, Liszka and Nazani, with Liszka boasting over 4500 followers on Instagram. She is excited to join the MyPeterinarian team and looks forward to caring for your pets just as if they were her own.

martin.bio: Meet Martin, the accountant who isn't afraid to switch from serious numbers to yodels in a quest for sustainable solutions for entrepreneurs. He specializes in giving scale-up companies the strategic map and economic structure they need to grow, ensuring their tax/accounting is done correctly - all while balancing with his family in Slagelse, bee gels, one dog, and a cat!

misty.bio: Misty, originally from Sweden, spent her upbringing in Singapore, developing a deep appreciation for diverse cultures and a lifelong love for pets. After being separated from her pet for five years, Misty understands that every dog and cat is unique, requiring her approach to ensure their own comfortable experience and aiming to give them the best and healthy grooming day. Previously involved in equestrian grooming and with experience at prestigious dog and puppy farms, Misty looks forward to building a trusting relationship with you and your beloved pet!

veronika.bio: Veronika is a 19-year-old student from Ukraine, currently in her second year of studying Public Management and Administration. She speaks Ukrainian, Russian, and English, and has also studied some basic Danish. Having a deep love for animals, Veronika is most excited to stay connected with pets in Ukraine. She is excited to bring her passion for animal care to our team and looks forward to fostering ensure your pets receive the attention and love they deserve while you're away. Veronika is happy to assist with any of your pet care needs.

quan.bio: Quan was born in China and moved to Denmark in 2022 for her education. She has been a dog lover for over 10 years and has developed a deep affection for animals. After moving to Copenhagen, she began looking for a steady friends for daily care of their pets, including dogs, cats, and rabbits. She enjoys various activities in her free time, such as working out in the gym, swimming, and hiking. Quan has a natural affinity with animals and quickly builds trust with them. She is excited to bring her enthusiasm, experience, and love for animals to MyPeterinarian, ensuring that every pet gets the care and devotion.

nikhil.bio: Nikhil is originally from India and has been living in Copenhagen for over seven years. He works as a software developer and is passionate about nature and outdoor activities. He has a strong interest in sustainability and loves animals of all kinds, especially dogs, horses, and dolphins. Nikhil is excited to join the MyPeterinarian team and looks forward to caring for your pets and they seem his own.

sarah.bio: Sarah hails from the U.S. and is currently completing her MSc in Environmental Engineering at DTU, with a focus on Environmental Management. With a B.A. in Engineering Sciences from Dartmouth, specializing in Mechanical Engineering, she has a wealth of experience in diverse fields. Sarah has built a fulfilling life surrounded by beloved pets ‚Äî a Husky, a Maltese, a Burmese cat, and a few hamsters and fish - fostering a lifelong bond with animals of all sizes and temperaments. Known for her warmth, organization, and responsibilities, Sarah is also an avid runner and hiker, exploring Denmark's scenic landscapes while relishing her Danish skills.

mariia.bio: Mariia has been an absolute cat lover for 27 years, and 2 of those were in Denmark. After moving from Kyiv, Ukraine, she started attending a Danish language school and majoring in English on her own. She understands that their connection is based on trust and loves animals very much, and recently has become addicted to huge Chinese novels. She also finds time to play modern computer games, especially if there is an opportunity to raise care of animals and develop their skills. She is delighted to have joined MyPeterinarian, because now she can enjoy the company of pets as much as they want!

ionela.bio: Meet Ionela, one of our dedicated pet sitters from Moldova, Romania. She has been living in Denmark since 2016. Ionela is a stage-mom with a four year old son who shares her love for animals. Their family includes four hamsters and they're welcoming to their apartment with a lovely garden and a fenced dog park just moments away. Ionela is excited to care for your pet, ensuring they feel right at home so you can relax and enjoy your vacation.

hero.title: Preventive Testing Campaign
hero.subtitle: Protect your pet's health with comprehensive testing at campaign prices. Save up to 50% on essential tests.

0.title: Early Detection

2.title: Cost Effective

tests.title: Available Tests
tests.subtitle: Choose from our comprehensive range of preventive tests

giardia.name: Giardia Test
giardia.description: Detect Giardia parasites that can affect both pets and humans. Essential for household safety.

lungworm.name: Lungworm Test
lungworm.description: Screen for lungworm infection, a serious respiratory parasite affecting dogs and cats.

basicFecal.name: Basic Fecal Test
basicFecal.description: Comprehensive stool analysis to detect common intestinal parasites and abnormalities.

combinedFecal.name: Combined Fecal Test
combinedFecal.description: Advanced fecal testing including multiple parasite screens and bacterial analysis.

comboTest.name: Combo Test Package
comboTest.description: Complete health screening combining multiple tests for comprehensive parasite detection.

0.title: Book Online
0.description: Schedule your preventive testing appointment through our easy booking system.

1.title: Sample Collection
1.description: Our veterinary team collects samples during your visit or provides home collection kits.

2.title: Laboratory Analysis
2.description: Samples are analyzed in our certified laboratory using advanced diagnostic equipment.

3.title: Results & Consultation
3.description: Receive detailed results and expert recommendations from our veterinary team.

forPets.title: For Dogs & Cats
forPets.description: All our preventive tests are suitable for both dogs and cats. Regular testing ensures your pet stays healthy and parasite-free throughout the year.

cta.title: Don't Miss This Campaign!
cta.description: Limited time offer. Book your preventive testing today and save up to 50% on essential health screenings.

careers.subtitle: Join Our Team
careers.description: MyPeterinarian is seeking passionate individuals to join our team. Help us improve the pet care and veterinary services industry by ensuring convenience and professionalism for pets and pet owners in Copenhagen.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: We're dedicated to improving the pet care and veterinary services industry by providing convenient, professional, and compassionate care for pets and their owners. Join us in making a real difference in the lives of pets and families across Copenhagen.

finance.title: Finance Manager
finance.description: We're looking for an experienced finance professional to lead our financial strategy and operations.
responsibilities: Develop and implement financial strategy and roadmap
Manage all financial operations and reporting
Provide strategic financial insights to leadership team
Collaborate with management on business planning
requirements: Strong analytical and strategic thinking skills
Experience with financial software and tools
Ability to work independently in flexible hours

veterinarian.title: Hybrid Veterinarian
veterinarian.description: Join our veterinary team providing exceptional care to pets across Copenhagen.
responsibilities: Conduct examinations and diagnose pet health issues
requirements: Fluent in English (Danish is a plus)

boarder.title: Seasonal Pet Boarder
boarder.description: Provide loving care for pets in your home or theirs during boarding periods.

marketing.title: Marketing Specialist Internship & Pet Caretaker
marketing.description: Combine your passion for marketing with hands-on pet care experience.
responsibilities: Develop and implement social media strategy
Create engaging content for multiple platforms

webdev.title: Web Developer Intern
webdev.description: Help us build and optimize our digital presence for pet owners across Copenhagen.
responsibilities: Collaborate with design and marketing teams
requirements: Knowledge of React, Next.js, or similar frameworks

application.title: How to Apply
application.instructions: To apply for any position, please email your CV to jobs@mypeterinarian.com with the position title in the subject line. We review applications on a rolling basis and will contact qualified candidates for interviews.

benefits.title: Why Join MyPeterinarian?
items: Make a real impact in pet care

cta.title: Ready to Join Our Team?
cta.description: Don't see the perfect position? Send us your CV anyway - we're always looking for talented individuals who share our passion for pet care.
